import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Editor } from "react-draft-wysiwyg"; import { EditorState, convertToRaw } from "draft-js"; import JsxParser from 'react-jsx-parser'; import SendIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Send'; import draftToHtml from 'draftjs-to-html'; import { Button, TextField } from "@material-ui/core"; import "react-draft-wysiwyg/dist/react-draft-wysiwyg.css"; import "../../ressources/scss/components/AdminSection.scss"; export default function AdminEditorSection() { let [preview, setPreview] = useState(''); const [editorState, setEditorState] = useState(() => EditorState.createEmpty() ); let handlePreview = () => { setPreview((draftToHtml(convertToRaw(editorState.getCurrentContent())))); console.log(preview) } useEffect(() => { }, [editorState]); return (
